channel.title: Problem|Bug|Firewall on WhonixGateway
channel.description:
Hi On Linux workstation i'm having issues with programs like nmap, netcat and others, they always report theres a port open when its not the case. Ive been doing alot of research already, i found the old forum where they had the same issue, but no one know how to solve it. https://sourceforge.net/p/whonix/discussion/general/thread/ac04011c/
Why is this happening and how to fix if its possible. Thanks

item.title: Problem|Bug|Firewall on WhonixGateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Allow discussion anonymous pentesting in Whonix forums? Organization
Update In short: banned Like many tools, Tor / Whonix itself is a dual use tool. Due to Tor usage statistics (http://planete.inrialpes.fr/papers/TorTraffic-NSS10.pdf) and low rates of abuse, I believe that on average, Tor does more good than harm. Are there any statistics on pentesting tools, on their good/harm ratio? I am not sure the combination of anonymity and pentesting is a useful one. Which legitimate use cases come to your mind? At the moment I believe making anonymous pentesting…

Read full topic

item.description:
Hi
On Linux workstation i’m having issues with programs like nmap, netcat and others, they always report theres a port open when its not the case. Ive been doing alot of research already, i found the old forum where they had the same issue, but no one know how to solve it.
